testcase.brief: MACAuth, 802.1X configured, 802.1X first Platform Dependence SR2024
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: 802.1X, MAC configured, initial auth is default 802.1X security-object <security-object name> security-object <security-object name> security aaa radius-server primary <ip address of radius server> shared-secret <share-key> security-object <security-object name> security aaa radius-server accounting primary <ip address of radius server> shared-secret <share-key> security-object <security-object name> security protocol-suite 802.1x security-object <security-object name> security additional-auth-method mac-based-auth auth-method chap interface <ethx/y> switchport mode access interface <ethx/y> security-object <security-object name>
Test Procedure: 1. Enable Auth on port, check port access, result 1

step.desc: configure mgt0.1 with dhcp service enable
step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.1 vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface mgt0.1 ip ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/${br.lan.netmask}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options netmask ${br.route.netmask}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options dns1 ${pub.dns1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server enable"

-v "security-object lan1" -v "security-object lan1 default-user-profile-attr 1" -v "security-object lan1 security protocol-suite 802.1x" -v "security-object lan1 security aaa radius primary ${pub.radius1.ip} shared-secret ${pub.radius1.sharesecret}" -v "security-object lan1 security additional-auth-method mac-based-auth auth-method chap"

step.desc: 2. Set one user-profile and define the attribute x, 3. Set the eth1 mode as bridge-access and bind the attribute to it 4. Bind the security-object to the eth1.
step.telnet: -v "user-profile lan1 qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${br1.vpc1.vlan} attribute 1" -v "interface eth1 mode bridge-access" -v "interface eth1 security-object lan1" -v "interface eth1 mac-learning enable" -v "_debug auth all" -v "clear auth station" -v "clear log all"

step.desc: -prepare config file with correct username and wrong password
step.ssh: -v "echo -e \" ctrl_interface=DIR=/var/run/wpa_supplicant \\n ap_scan=0 \\n network={ \\n key_mgmt=IEEE8021X \\n eap=MD5 \\n identity=\\x22${br1.vpc1.tif.mac}\\x22 \\n password=\\x22${br1.vpc1.tif.mac}\\x22 \\n eapol_flags=0 \\n } \" > /tmp/step3.1_wpa_supplicant.conf"

step.desc: set br1.vpc1.tif.ip var for vpc1 on BR side

step.log-match: -n -c -i "MAC-based auth: RADIUS server send OK to station ${br1.vpc1.tif.mac}"
